entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
